self_predictions.prediction_summary: Janis believes he has a good chance to beat Mindaugas, citing his ability to perform better in official competitions compared to practice sessions.
self_predictions.style_conflict: Janis expects a power game and believes he can find a position where he is stronger.

Mindaugas Tarasaitis.strength: Strong in hand control, back pressure, and pronation control.
Mindaugas Tarasaitis.previous_match_summary: Mindaugas has shown strength in both top-roll and hook positions, as seen in his match with Tom Holland.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Janis hopes to see a healthy and motivated John Brzenk, who he believes can control the center but may struggle to pin Kanai multiple times.
third_party_predictions.style_conflict: Kanai might use a king's move, while John could use a wrist press.

John Brzenk.previous_match_summary: John has shown dominance in center control but may struggle with injuries.

Yoshinobu Kanai.strength: Dangerous with his hand and wrist.
Yoshinobu Kanai.previous_match_summary: Kanai has shown effectiveness against top rollers.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Janis and Mindaugas favor Georgi if both are healthy, citing his ability to dominate the center position.
third_party_predictions.style_conflict: Georgi's center control vs. Dave's ability to press without a wrist.

Dave Chaffee.health: Recent struggles with hand and wrist health.
Dave Chaffee.previous_match_summary: Dave has struggled recently but claims to be healthier now.

Georgi Tsvetkov.previous_match_summary: Georgi has shown strong center control in past matches.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Both Janis and Mindaugas see Devon as the favorite, with Corey's only chance being a press.

Devon Larratt.strength: Versatile and strong with left arm.
Devon Larratt.previous_match_summary: Devon has been improving his left arm recently.

Corey West.previous_match_summary: Corey has shown effectiveness with his left arm.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Both Janis and Mindaugas favor Ongarbaev, assuming he is healthy post-elbow surgery.
third_party_predictions.style_conflict: Ongarbaev's effectiveness against top rollers vs. Matt Mask's style.

Matt Mask.previous_match_summary: Matt has shown resilience but may struggle against top-tier opponents.

Kydyrgali Ongarbaev.previous_match_summary: Ongarbaev has dominated top rollers in the past.

self_predictions.prediction_summary: Mindaugas is confident in his victory, stating a 97-98% chance of winning based on his 'armwrestling math'.
self_predictions.style_conflict: Mindaugas believes the match will be a power game and expects to dominate Janis.

Janis Amolins.strength: Janis is strong but Mindaugas believes he is stronger.
Janis Amolins.health: Janis has healed from injuries but may still have some limitations.
Janis Amolins.previous_match_summary: Janis has performed well in official matches, often better than in practice.
